member.name: T:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods defined for the class.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Get MD5 hash of a string

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Method that check if array contain given string lower representation
member.returns: returns true if array has this value and false if not

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: The method parse string to its 16-bit representation
member.returns: if the conversion succeeded,method returns 16-bit signed integer value equivalent of the number contained in input or zero if the conversion failed.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: The method parse string to its 32-bit representation
member.returns: if the conversion succeeded,method returns 32-bit signed integer value equivalent of the number contained in input or zero if the conversion failed.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: The method parse string to its 64-bit representation
member.returns: if the conversion succeeded,method returns 64-bit signed integer value equivalent of the number contained in input or zero if the conversion failed.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: The method parse string to its date time representation
member.returns: if the conversion succeeded,method returns date time value equivalent to the date and time contained in input or MinValue if the conversion failed.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: The method capitalize the first letter of given string
member.param: the string that we want to change first letter

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: The method extract string between two others strings
member.param: the string from which is extracted string
position from which is started the searching of the substring
member.returns: Returns string between two other strings. If the start string or end string do not exist in the input, or some of them is null or empty returns empty string.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: The method that convert in given string its cyrillic letters to latin

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: The method that convert in given string its latin letters to cyrillic

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: The method that convert in given string its cyrillic letters to latin and replace all non-alphanumeric characters with empty string,excluding the period "."

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: The method that convert in given string its cyrillic letters to latin,spaces are replaced with hyphens and all non-alphanumeric characters excluding the period "." and hyphen "-" , are removed

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: The method extract substring whose start from first letter and whose length is the smaller of the string's length and charsCount
member.param: the string from which is extracted the substring
number of characters of the substring

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: The method check what is the file extension

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: The method returns the content type for the specified file extension
member.returns: The content type as a string.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtentions.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a set of characters from the specified character array into a sequence of bytes.
member.returns: A byte array containing the specified set of characters.
